Html:
Hi,

How can i enter automatically in edit mode with focus on the first focusable control located inside a DataGridTemplateColumn.CellEditingTemplate, when i select a cell in a datagrid with mouse click or cursor keys, if all my datagrid columns are defined with DatagridTemplateColumns ?

Thanks.

Rui G.

RuiG,

http://wpf.codeplex.com/Wiki/View.aspx?title=Single-Click%20Editing&referringTitle=Home
This article describes how to enter edit mode with single click. In your case you mkight want to do this in the PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown event handler of your first focusable control.

Thanks.
